characters: Driver of a black sedan, driver of a white car
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road. The black sedan ahead is slowing down, and the white car on the right is moving closer to the self-driving vehicles lane.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while keeping a safe distance from the black sedan ahead. The vehicle is also monitoring the white car on the right, which is moving closer to the lane.
key_objects: 1) Front: A black sedan, approximately 10 meters away, slowing down. 2) Right: A white car, approximately 5 meters away, moving closer to the self-driving vehicles lane.
